required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Modafinil Effects on EEG Biomarkers of Reward and Motivation
clinical_study.official_title: Neurophysiological Biomarkers of Behavioral Dimensions From Cross-species Paradigms

brief_summary.textblock: The effects of modafinil on measures of brain electrical activity will be tested.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Experimental medicine model; not an intervention. Within-subject double-blind placebo-controlled dose-response study.
study_design_info.masking_description: University of California, San Diego Experimental Pharmacy randomizes dose order and provides masked pills

primary_outcome.description: Frontal alpha power by block in the probabilistic learning task
Parietal EEG alpha power peak in first - final step toward breakpoint

arm_group.description: Drug: modafinil, Provigil, Alertec, Modavigil Dosage form, frequency and duration: Each participant receives a single pill of placebo or active drug (modafinil 100 mg or 200 mg) 30 minutes after arriving at the lab. The participant then completes approximately 6 hours of testing in the laboratory. The participant stays at the lab for 7.5 hours in order to monitor physical condition in case the participant received the active pill. One week later, that participant receives a single pill of an alternate comparator and is again tested in the laboratory. Thus, in total, each participant receives one placebo pill and two active pills, each time separated by one week.

intervention.description: Drug: modafinil Each participant receives a single pill of placebo or active drug (modafinil 100 mg or 200 mg) 30 minutes after arriving at the lab. The participant then completes approximately 6 hours of testing in the laboratory. The participant stays at the lab for 7.5 hours in order to monitor physical condition in case the participant received the active pill. One week later, that participant receives a single pill of an alternate comparator and is again tested in the laboratory. Thus, in total, each participant receives one placebo pill and two active pills, each time separated by one week. Other Names: Provigil Alertec Modavigil

Drug: Placebo Each participant receives a single pill of placebo or active drug (modafinil 100 mg or 200 mg) 30 minutes after arriving at the lab. The participant then completes approximately 6 hours of testing in the laboratory. The participant stays at the lab for 7.5 hours in order to monitor physical condition in case the participant received the active pill. One week later, that participant receives a single pill of an alternate comparator and is again tested in the laboratory. Thus, in total, each participant receives one placebo pill and two active pills, each time separated by one week.

criteria.textblock:
Exclusion criteria
- history of substance abuse
- mental illness in a first degree relative
- significant medical illness (e.g. cancer, diabetes, heart disease, HIV)
- history of seizure
- open head injury or closed head injury with loss of consciousness > 1 min
- pregnancy
- current psychotropic drug use
- R-hand injury
- hearing or visual impairment
- urine toxicology positive for recreational drug use

facility.name: University of California, San Diego; Clinical Teaching Facilities, Hillcrest
